bButton/ghost.description: make background transparent and invert text and border colors, added in 2.7

bButton/htmlType.description: set the original html type of button, see: MDN

bButton/icon.description: set the icon of button, see: Icon component

bButton/loading.description: set the loading status of button

bButton/shape.description: can be set to circle or omitted

bButton/size.description: can be set to small large or omitted

bButton/type.description: can be set to primary ghost dashed danger(added in 2.7) or omitted (meaning default)

bButton/block.description: option to fit button width to its parent width
